name: Block Madness (VeraPedersen)
description:
It's a fun and intense platform game centered around the switching of colour. Change our colour to match the platforms.

Has support for keyboard and gamepad.
Controls, Keyboard:

 Esc - Menu
 Arrow keys or WASD - Movement
Space - Jump
1 - Green
2 - Red
3- Blue
R - Respawn

Gamepad (based of the x-box controller):

 Start - Menu
 Left joystick - Movement
Right Trigger - Jump
A - Green
B - Red
X- Blue

Music: Bensound.com
